Name: Broccoli (PH)
Description: It's very healthy. The hardy plant can handle some pretty cold temperatures.

DescriptionLocalization.es: It's very healthy. The hardy plant can handle some pretty cold temperatures.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: It's very healthy. The hardy plant can handle some pretty cold temperatures.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Es ist sehr gesund. Die winterharte Pflanze verträgt ziemlich kalte Temperaturen.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: It's very healthy. The hardy plant can handle some pretty cold temperatures.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: It's very healthy. The hardy plant can handle some pretty cold temperatures.
DescriptionLocalization.it: It's very healthy. The hardy plant can handle some pretty cold temperatures.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: It's very healthy. The hardy plant can handle some pretty cold temperatures.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: It's very healthy. The hardy plant can handle some pretty cold temperatures.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Разновидность капусты. Очень полезна для здоровья. Может выдерживать довольно низкие температуры.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: It's very healthy. The hardy plant can handle some pretty cold temperatures.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 绿色蔬菜。西兰花属于耐寒蔬菜，能适应相当严寒的气温。
